entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 19.
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with a few showers beginning in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 19. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the evening and overnight. Showers beginning before morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 then light in the evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
